name: Enigmatic
description:
Enigmatic is a 2D riddle platformer where the physical input changes each level without the player’s knowledge. The player can discover what the new input is based on answers to riddles given before each level.

Once a riddle is solved, the first letter of the answer is the key players use to defeat the platformer level and progress to the next riddle.

A demo of Enigmatic can be played for free here!

RELEASE DATE: Firday, August 15th
